description:
This market will resolve to the team that officially announces Mike Tomlin has joined it in any professional coaching or football operations role (including, but not limited to, head coach, assistant coach, or senior football staff) by April 23, 2026, at 11:59 PM ET.

If Mike Tomlin does not officially join any team by April 23, 2026, at 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to “No team”.

If Mike Tomlin announces his official retirement, that he is joining a non-professional team, or that he will be taking a year off from coaching for any reason including media commitments within this market's timeframe, this market will immediately resolve to “No team”.

If Mike Tomlin joins a professional team not listed as an option, this market will resolve to “Other”.

Temporary roles, interim titles, or short-term appointments do count, provided they are officially announced as such.

The resolution source is a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Mike Tomlin next team?

question: Will Mike Tomlin join the New York Giants prior to April 23, 2026?
